summary.name: Virtual Ecstasy
summary.description: A deck for those who want to strip away every inhibition and give in to a long-distance game where anything goes. Fingers type, voice commands, the body obeys. The pleasure is real, even if the screen separates you.

quests.content: Get completely naked, take a faceless photo and send it to your partner with the message: 'This body is all yours.'
Send a voice message telling your partner everything you want them to do with their fingers. No filter.
Write an explicit scene where you're forced to masturbate on their command, describing everything.
Film a short video (5–10 sec) where you touch yourself over your underwear, looking into the camera without saying a word.
Write a message describing exactly what you'd like to do with your tongue to your partner right now.
Record an audio where you're masturbating and moaning. No words, just real sounds.
Write step by step what you're doing while pleasuring yourself thinking about your partner.
Film a short video where you're masturbating with one hand while holding the camera on your genitals with the other.
Order your partner to come while watching your video or photo. Tell them exactly what you want to see happen.
Write a fantasy about domination or submission, where your partner is your sexual object.
Write a short dirty monologue describing an orgasm during penetration. Don’t use euphemisms.
Record a video of yourself coming or simulating orgasm realistically, and send it immediately to your partner.
Write what you'd do to your partner if they were tied up in front of you, naked and completely at your mercy.
Send a photo of your body messy after orgasm, even just partially.
Come while listening to your partner’s audio or watching their video. Then just message: 'Yours.'
Write your ultimate dirty talk: the filthiest line you’d whisper in their ear during sex.
Film your naked body as you slowly caress yourself after orgasm.
Write a message that includes the words 'dirty', 'hunger', 'wet', 'command', and 'inside'. It must make sense.
End the game with an obscene promise you'll keep the next time you see each other, written black on white.
